name: APS — Sonoran Flats O&M
description: Full-scope O&M for 400 MW Sonoran Flats Solar including panel cleaning / inverter maintenance / vegetation / SCADA monitoring / performance reporting
terms: 20-year O&M agreement with 5-year renewal options. Includes availability guarantee of 99.2%
responseTimeSla: 4 hours for critical / 24 hours for non-critical

name: SRP — Phoenix Grid BESS O&M
description: Full-scope O&M for 200 MW / 800 MWh Phoenix Grid BESS including cell monitoring / thermal management / PCS maintenance / capacity testing
terms: 15-year O&M with augmentation triggers. Capacity warranty: 80% at year 15. Includes 24/7 SCADA monitoring
responseTimeSla: 2 hours for critical (grid dispatch) / 8 hours for non-critical

name: NV Energy — Mojave Gateway O&M
description: Preventive maintenance and monitoring for 350 MW Mojave Gateway Solar. Excludes panel cleaning (separate vendor)
terms: 20-year PM agreement. Quarterly inverter inspections / annual tracker maintenance / thermal imaging / string-level monitoring

name: SPP — Great Plains Wind O&M
description: Full-scope wind farm O&M for 72 Vestas V162 turbines. Includes scheduled maintenance / unscheduled repairs / blade inspection / oil changes / SCADA
terms: 20-year full-wrap O&M. Availability guarantee 97.5%. Includes Vestas SSA pass-through for major components
responseTimeSla: 4 hours for critical / 48 hours for scheduled

name: Microsoft — PPA Asset Monitoring
description: Remote SCADA monitoring and quarterly performance reporting for Microsoft's 150 MW PPA allocation at Sonoran Flats
terms: 10-year monitoring-only agreement. Monthly generation reports / quarterly investor-grade reports / annual site audit
